author: Emily Fuchs (she/they)
title: Final Exam Clashes or Hardships
question:
Please complete this survey if you have an exam clash or an exam hardship that affects the CPSC 110 final exam.
  UBC defines exam clashes and exam hardships as outlined below:
An exam clash happens when multiple exams are scheduled on the same day at the same time.
An exam hardship is defined as 3 or more end-of-term exams in a 24-hour period. Please only fill out this survey if CPSC 110 is the second (middle) examination in your exam hardship. 
You must complete the survey before 11:59 PM PDT on Thursday, March 24.
  https://ubc.ca1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_8kvts62JiE0tFTo
